title: An atc [sic] approving of the good services done by the town of Glascow [sic], shire of Argyle and other western shires, in this conjuncture, with a return of the thanks of the estates to them.
author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.
publisher: Printed at Edinburgh, re-printed at London, by George Croom, at the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle,
notes: Signed at end: Ja. Dalrymple, Cls.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
